title: About me
first-contact: I had my first contact with programming when I was studying a degree in computer science and business management.
after-studies: After that, I decided to pursue my passion for programming and web development by learning on my own.
favorite-part-of-programming: My favorite part of programming is the problem-solving aspect.
why-i-love-programming: I love the feeling of finally figuring out a solution to a problem. And also, I've always loved the fact that I can take an idea in my head and turn it into something real through code.
core-stack: My core stack is PHP, Python, React, Vue, MySQL and PostgreSQL.
i-am-familiar-with: I am also familiar with TypeScript and Java.
looking-for: I am always looking to learn new technologies. I am currently looking for a full-time position as a web developer (Front o Back).
